text:
RESUME
Krishan Singh Malhan
Email : ksmalhan2010@gmail.com                                    
Mobile: 9871470924
Objective:
To be a part of an Organization where I can take up challenges and 
execute them with the best of my skills and abilities resulting in the 
growth of the Organization.
Technical Qualification:
Diploma in Mechanical (Air conditioning and refrigeration) from 
naval Dockyard Bombay in 1987. 
Intermediate from Haryana Board (PCM). 
Professional Experience:
Presently working in MGF Metropolitan Mall Gurgaon as a Sr. 
Engineer from 2003 to till date.
Worked as a Site Engineer in M/S SICCL, Sahara Mall Gurgaon from
2001 to 2003. 
Worked as  HVAC Supervisor in Foreign companies in  Gulf from 
1994 to 2001.                                                                                         
Worked as a Sr. Technician in Naval Dockyard from 1987 to 1994.  
Job Profiles / Summary of Skills: 
All types of work in building engineering services.
Erection, testing and commissioning of reciprocating, centrifugal 
and screw chiller machines. Various AHU, FCU and hot water 
generator, Ozone generator and allied ducting and piping.                 
Planning Installation and commissioning of all LV & HV switch gear 
panels. 
Planning and Installation of Bus ducts and raising mains, Elevators 
& Escalators. 
Planning Installation and commissioning of PLC system, access 
control system.  Maintenance and operation of building automation system. 
Maintenance and operation of water treatment plant and sewage 
system plant.
Operation and preventive as well as break down maintenance of fire 
control system. 
Operation and preventive as well as break down maintenance of HT/
LT panels / DG panel and auto synchronization panel. 
Operation and preventive as well as break down of DG sets, pumps 
cooling towers etc. 
Operation and maintenance of preventive as well as break down 
maintenance of various types of UPS, fire panels, ACB, VCB, MCCB 
relays starters and transformers etc.  
Managerial / Executive:
Planning various day to day activities, allocating man power 
materials for the purpose and getting the job done. 
Planning the optimum level of inventory of spares and diesel, Lube 
oil interacting with suppliers, making sure optimum utilization of 
the materials and insuring their safe secure custody. 
Checking the quality and quantity of the material supplied as per 
the standards by all possible techniques. 
Inspecting the day to day progress of work at site. 
Planning for project work, coordinating with clients for their project
works, checking their services drawings giving them go ahead for 
their works  
Well versed with all the latest security system for projects
